New Records: Anrich Nortje took career-best figures of 4-0-7-4 in the match
Quinton de Kock scored the top score of 20 runs for South Africa
Key Match Events: The game was a low-scoring affair with only 12 boundaries across both innings
Anrich Nortje's dismissal of key Sri Lankan batsmen was a turning point
The match was significant as New York hosted its first major cricket event
Pre-Game Insights: The match was seen as a bold move by organizers despite the challenges of hosting in New York
The crowd of 12,500 included a mix of locals and expats, showing enthusiasm for the event
Post-Match Reflections: South Africa's victory was celebrated as a success despite the slow scoring rate
The win was highlighted as a pivotal moment in the tournament context
Miscellaneous Highlights: The match was played at a slow scoring rate of just over four an over
The new Nassau County International Cricket Stadium was a central focus of the event
